title: [Large-scale] Data-Driven Decision-Making Strategies for Predicting Water Meter Failures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, machine learning concepts, and data preprocessing experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening data analysis competencies for administrative/managerial professionals to improve public infrastructure maintenance efficiency.

learning_goals: They can explain methods for identifying failure patterns using real-world water meter datasets.
They can design data quality management procedures in RNN model training, categorized into three or more stages.
They can interpret prediction model performance metrics (accuracy of 80% or higher) and suggest improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
